problem.markdown:
1. What are the intermediatary states in a chemical reaction? () Nucleophiles (X) Transition states () Catalyst () Water
2. In which solvent SN2 reaction proceeds well () Ethane () Water () Benzene (x) DMSO
3. Transition states are very stable () True (x) False
4. Is the geometry of the transition state different comapred with reactant (x)True () False
5. Will the solvent play a role in reaction mechanisms (x) Yes () No () Can't say
problem.p: 1. What are the intermediatary states in a chemical reaction?
